overview: â€œIt is a difficult task to achieve an existential balance, and sometimes it is not necessarily possible. Sometimes, in the complex construction of our personality, the strongest component ends up prevailing, the one capable of silencing all the others. But this often leads us to suffering, to a continuous mutation of ourselves ". Andrea and Nora, two longtime friends, are working together on the drafting of a screenplay, the two characters "from the film" collide with the "real" characters.
title: Fiction
